thread.title: Infant Passport Address to be endorsed Query
thread.title_full: Infant Passport Address to be endorsed Query

author: kpultimate
title: Infant Passport Address to be endorsed Query
text: Dear All, I am planning apply the passport for my one month old kid. Me & my wife hold the a valid passport and spouse name endorsed only my wife passport. Both the passports didn't have the same address endorsed, but will fall under one RPO. Now I stay in a different state, ideally I want my permanent address which is there in my passport to be endorsed for the kid's passport. Please let me know which address to be endorsed for the kid passport? Thank you.
